title: Molarity of 60.00g glucose in 250.0 mL solution

content.question:
A student prepares a solution by dissolving 
60.00 g of glucose (molar mass 180.2 g mol-1) in enough distilled water to make 250.0 mL of solution. The molarity of the solution should be reported as

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
